attributes.action: not allow mobile phone use on aeroplanes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every where we go there's always somebody talking loudly on their mobile. The daily commute to work is harsh enough, but having someone sat next to you on their mobile is such a pain! Please don't allow this to happen on flights. Can you imagine phone ringing every minute and fat cats talking the whole time. Give us a break!
